channel.title: [ Fix ] NoClassDefFoundError : Gui
channel.description:
I am really tired of people not getting that you have to have [B][U]JDK[/U][/B] and set your [B][U]Environment Variables[/U][/B]
I will show you step by step what you must do! if you do not get it after this then im sorry there is no hope for you..
1. [URL=http://"https://sdlc1b.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=28CCC559406C9712CD98F4EE1F64150B"]Click here to download JDK[/URL]
2. Install it ( hopefully you have no problems with this.. )
NOW FOR THE PICTURES!
3. [img]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables.jpg[/img]
4.[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables2.jpg[/img]
5. once a popup comes Type in the top field and in the bottom type and press ok.
6. now find this [img]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/variables5.jpg[/img]
and double click on it, and add to the end
press ok on all open windows and it should be fixed now
- some of these pictures are not mine as i do not have xp, i have vista so if you these are yours then just tell me ill acknowledge u
if you have any more questions feel free to ask them..

item.title: [ Fix ] NoClassDefFoundError : Gui

item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

I am really tired of people not getting that you have to have JDK and set your Environment Variables

I will show you step by step what you must do! if you do not get it after this then im sorry there is no hope for you…

  1. Click here to download JDK

  2. Install it ( hopefully you have no problems with this… )

NOW FOR THE PICTURES!

4.

  1. once a popup comes Type in the top field
    and in the bottom type
    and press ok.

  2. now find this

and double click on it, and add to the end

press ok on all open windows and it should be fixed now
